title: Install Archive Explorer
description: Install the app on your device for a better, faster, and more integrated experience.

benefits.title: Benefits of Installing:
benefits.item2: Faster launching directly from your home screen or desktop.
benefits.item3: Offline access to previously viewed content and your library.

ios.title: How to Install on iOS
ios.step1: Tap the 'Share' button in your browser toolbar.
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.

notAvailable: Installation is not currently supported by your browser.
